parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tire Failure due to Exhaust Heat
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire failure can lead to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries. The frequent occurrence of tire blowouts on Peterbilt 388 car haulers can cause significant financial losses and downtime for fleet operators.
symptoms: with the potential to damage adjacent tires and vehicle components.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Steer Tire Failures on Peterbilt 388 Trucks
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Steer tire failures can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries, especially at high speeds or when carrying heavy loads.
symptoms: Frequent steer tire failures on Peterbilt 388 trucks
often occurring when the vehicle is close to its maximum weight capacity
with the potential to cause damage to the vehicle and its components.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rear Axle Tire Failure due to Overheating
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear axle tires can cause blowouts, leading to accidents, damage to the truck and trailer, and costly repairs. The overheating of tires can also lead to a loss of control, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: thread is coming out of the tire
tire still holds air after thread comes out
and safety wings on the trailer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design of the exhaust pipe can cause the inside tire to overheat, leading to blowouts and accidents. The lack of reimbursement from the manufacturer can also lead to significant financial losses for the owner.
symptoms: thread is coming out of the tire
tire still holds air after thread comes out
and safety wings on the trailer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The use of inadequate tires can lead to blowouts, accidents, and costly repairs. The lack of a solution from the manufacturer can also lead to significant financial losses for the owner.
symptoms: thread is coming out of the tire
tire still holds air after thread comes out
and safety wings on the trailer.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Cummins ISX15 Engine Failure due to Fuel Pump and After Treatment System Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the fuel pump and after treatment system can cause the engine to shut off suddenly, leading to a loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially catastrophic consequences, especially at high speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Failure of After Treatment System and Fuel Pump Design
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design flaws in the after treatment system and fuel pump can cause engine failure, leading to safety hazards, financial losses, and business closures for owner-operators.
symptoms: The after treatment system codes flashing on the dashboard
and repeated repairs and maintenance costs.
